page.title: 05HOMELIFE P.CLARKE BURGHILL
page.content: I get up at 6.45a.m. I make the sandwiches for the girls and myself.Then I get the girls up and get them off to school. I then leave for work at 8.30a.m. I work at the local fruit farm, we start work at a quarter to nine. We do all kinds of jobs.We have our lunch at 12.30p.m. untill 1 o'clock. We finish work at 3.30p.m.When I get home I wash and change and then I start to cook the tea.We finish tea at about a quarter to six after which I clear up and then I sit and knit or watch T.V. Some nights I go to meetings or Womens Institute. I go to bed at around 10.30p.m.
